instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install fonts (Outfit, DM Sans) in index.css via @import or HTML link.
2. THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js with the provided color palette. Use CSS variables for flexibility.
3. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components but heavily style them with the 'rounded-3xl' and 'shadow-card' classes to match the friendly/organic vibe.
4. LAYOUT: Keep the layout single-column on mobile (max-w-md mx-auto) for the assessment flow to maintain focus.
5. INTERACTION: Add micro-interactions. When a user selects an answer, the card should pulse or highlight before moving to the next question.
6. LANGUAGE: Implement the language toggle using a context provider to switch text strings dynamically.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash/Pexels URLs. Do not use placeholders.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all buttons, inputs, and result cards (e.g., 'start-assessment-btn', 'answer-option-1').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
